data.comment: Queensy Menig puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 10, Jayden Oosterwolde with an assist there.
The second-half is underway at Grolsch Veste Stadium.
In the minute 50, An attacking Enschede player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Enschede have extended their lead to 2-0 courtesy of a Danilo penalty.
George Cox is on a sub for Branislav Ninaj for Sittard.
In the minute 63, Ron Jans is making the team's first substitution at Grolsch Veste Stadium with Alexander Jeremejeff replacing Danilo.
Queensy Menig (Enschede) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The away team have replaced Ben Rienstra with Lisandro Semedo. This is the second substitution made today by Kevin Hofland.
In the minute 74, Lazaros Lamprou is replacing Vaclav Cerny for the home team.
Leeuwen Thijs Van is replacing Queensy Menig for Enschede at Grolsch Veste Stadium.
Enschede make their third substitution with Nathan Markelo replacing Tyronne Ebuehi.
In the minute 84, The away team replace Emil Hansson with Bassala Sambou.
Allard Lindhout blows to end the match. The final score is 2-0.
Ramiz Zerrouki is on a sub for Jesse Bosch for Enschede.
